segments.text: I â€™ m making a shopping-list , Tom .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We need a lot of things this week . I must go to the grocer's . We haven't got much tea or coffee , and we haven't got any sugar or jam .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I must go to the greengrocer's . We haven ; t got many tomatoes , but we've got a lot of potatoes . I must go to the butcher's , too . We need some meat . We haven't got any meat at all .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have we got any beer and wine ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , we haven't . And I'm not going to get any !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope that you've got some money .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I haven't got much either !
segments.speaker: S1
